alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:23PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Harrison and east central Hancock Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 122 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kiln, or 7 miles west of Diamondhead, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Kiln and Shoreline Park. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 6 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
